metadata.title: CVE-2019-17566 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Batik is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused byimproper input validation by the "xlink:href" attributes. By using aspecially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability tocause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests.

criterions.comment: batik: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
